name: Shaadipulse.com
tag_list: indian-wedding-tools, indian-wedding-planning, indian-wedding-budget, indian-wedding-checklist, indian-wedding-rsvp, indian-wedding-ideas
overview:
A simple but robust, wedding planning website.

ShaadiPulse was founded with one objective, “It’s your wedding, who else knows to plan it better than you and your family”. It creates technology connect between the engaged couples and their wedding plans, helping them to keep on track of the progress on the go.

Weddings are the moments in our life, which needs every bit of attention one could possibly put in given the current fast forward life that we live in , it becomes trickier and tougher to pay the same attention that we would actually want towards the mega event of life. The ShaadiPulse team is set out to solve the persistent disconnect between the engaged couples and their wedding plan with the blend technology into the wedding and event industry.

ShaadiPulse offers a comprehensive suite of online planning tools for wedding, including wedding budget management (My Wallet) and wedding checklist management (My Todo ), Task Allocation (My League) vendor management (My Vendor), all at no charge. ShaadiPulse is about helping the bride and groom execute efficiently and effectively on their weddings.
